data.message: I need some fan to help me stick the land and I know it's you when I think about who I am. I am him I am the on within Eminem if you listen to his intelligence he ll represent let me get some talent from you not that man Stan lol but I bet I already did caught up in the never lands oops god damn cut my left out just to be the sand warmth on your feet when I say you need a lil bit just to stand and you know I got more protein then Peter Pan in a can I'm innocent in a sense so let me rap with you just kidding I just did when told me how to live and you taught me how to dip straight into the holy waters like the river Jordan no Sam I am no pretend living these lessons blessings only blessing only blessings only blessings
